string.name: whats_new_text
string.translation_description: Description of new features in this version in html

resources.string:
New in version %s

\t • Using the gyro is now the default for phones that support it
\t • Workaround for a Samsung S4 and Note 3 bug that caused a crash on start up
\t • Workaround for a bug in some phones that misreport rotation sensor status
